verbs.description: [V: Facing] [ARG1: a rising tide of outrage from Democrats and some Republicans over the forced separation of migrant children and parents at the U.S .- Mexico border] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] dug in Monday , again falsely blaming Democrats in the escalating political crisis .
